info.author: Barry Barnreiter
info.description:
OpenOPC for Python is an easy to use OPC (OLE for Process Control) library for
use with the Python programming language. The project includes a Windows gateway
service allowing non-Windows clients to also access OPC-DA calls.
info.name: OpenOPC
info.html_description: OpenOPC for Python is an easy to use OPC (OLE for Process Control) library for use with the Python programming language. The project includes a Windows gateway service allowing non-Windows clients to also access OPC-DA calls.
